text: (And every man's augury) the scroll containing his answer to [the angels] Munkar and Nakir in the grave (have We fastened to his own neck) it is also said that this refers to every man's good and evil deeds; and it is also said that it refers to whether he is felicitous or damned, (and We shall bring forth for him on the Day of Resurrection a book which he will find) he will be given (wide open) containing his good and bad deeds.
